00002  *******************************************************
00003  *              HARD CLIP AN AUDIO SIGNAL
00004  *******************************************************
00005  *              Tap.Tools Blue Object

00007  *

00009 
00010 // Check against redundant including
00011 #ifndef TT_CLIP_H
00012 #define TT_CLIP_H
00013 
00014 // Include appropriate headers
00015 #include "tt_audio_base.h"
00016 
00017 
00018 /********************************************************
00019         CLASS INTERFACE/IMPLEMENTATION
00020 
00021         The entire class is implemented inline for speed.
00022  ********************************************************/
00023 
00024 class tt_clip:public tt_audio_base{
00025 
00026         private:
00027                 tt_attribute_value              clip_high_value;
00028                 tt_attribute_value              clip_low_value; 
00029                 
00030         public:
00031                 enum selectors{                                                                         // Attribute Selectors
00032                         k_clip,
00033                         k_clip_high,
00034                         k_clip_low
00035                 };
00036                 
00037                 // OBJECT LIFE                                  
00038                 tt_clip(void)                                                                           // Constructor          
00039                 {
00040                         set_attr(k_clip_high, 1.0);
00041                         set_attr(k_clip_low, -1.0);
00042                 }
00043 
00044                 ~tt_clip(void)                                                                          // Destructor
00045                 {
00046                         ;
00047                 }
00048 
00049 
00050                 // ATTRIBUTES
00051                 void set_attr(tt_selector sel, tt_attribute_value val)  // Set Attributes
00052                 {
00053                         switch (sel){
00054                                 case k_clip:
00055                                         clip_high_value = decibels_to_amplitude(val);
00056                                         clip_low_value = clip_high_value * -1.0;
00057                                         break;
00058                                 case k_clip_high:
00059                                         clip_high_value = val;
00060                                         break;
00061                                 case k_clip_low:
00062                                         clip_low_value = val;
00063                                         break;
00064                         }
00065                 }
00066 
00067                 tt_attribute_value get_attr(tt_selector sel)                            // Get Attributes
00068                 {
00069                         switch (sel){
00070                                 case k_clip:            // fall through
00071                                 case k_clip_high:
00072                                         return clip_high_value;
00073                                         break;
00074                                 case k_clip_low:
00075                                         return clip_low_value;
00076                         }
00077                         return 0.0;
00078                 }
00079                                 
00080                 
00081                 // DSP LOOP
00082                 void dsp_vector_calc(tt_audio_signal *in, tt_audio_signal *out)
00083                 {
00084                         temp_vs = in->vectorsize;               
00085                         while(temp_vs--)
00086                                 *out->vector++ = clip(*in->vector++, clip_low_value, clip_high_value);
00087                         in->reset(); out->reset();
00088                 }
00089                 
00090                 // DSP LOOP
00091                 void dsp_vector_calc(tt_audio_signal *in1, tt_audio_signal *in2,
00092                         tt_audio_signal *out1, tt_audio_signal *out2)
00093                 {
00094                         temp_vs = in1->vectorsize;              
00095                         while(temp_vs--){
00096                                 *out1->vector++ = clip(*in1->vector++, clip_low_value, clip_high_value);
00097                                 *out2->vector++ = clip(*in2->vector++, clip_low_value, clip_high_value);
00098                         }
00099                         in1->reset(); in2->reset(); out1->reset(); out2->reset();
00100                 }
00101                 
00102 };
00103 
00104 #endif // TT_CLIP_H
00105
